articles.description: Apple will release either the iPhone 12s or the iPhone 13 this year, but it will most likely just get minimal upgrades from the models last year. Last year, Ap
articles.content: Last year, Apple made a big splash in the smartphone market despite the pandemic. After several months of suppressed sales due to strict global lockdowns, Apple cashed in during the last quarter of 2… [+2523 chars]
